text: WIZU-LP (99.9 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Newark, Delaware. The station is owned by Newark Community Radio Inc. It airs a science-focused talk radio format. The station was assigned the WIZU-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on February 14, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * IZU-LP IZU-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2017 Category:2017 establishments in Delaware Category:Talk radio stations in the United States Category:New Castle County, Delaware
title: WIZU-LP
